markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fighter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=709) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 226 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Fighter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=7)

**Prerequisites**
Strength 14; Dexterity 14

</column>

---

You become trained in simple weapons and martial weapons. You become trained in your choice of [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You become trained in fighter class DC.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the fighter archetype.

<title level="2">Fighter Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Maneuver](/Feats.aspx?ID=710), [Diverse Weapon Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=714), [Fighter Resiliency](/Feats.aspx?ID=711), [Opportunist](/Feats.aspx?ID=712)
name: Fighter Dedication
